Package Boundary

package Boundary
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BookingBoundary
    Interface for booking of movie A customer can search for a booking list the top 5 movies by sales list bookings list prices purchase tickets view seat options list booking details select/unselect seats confirm selection list show times
    CinemaBoundary
    Interface for managing the cinema for staff members A staff can list cinema details list cinemas manage the cinema show time
    CineplexBoundary
    Interface for managing the cineplex for staff members A staff can choose the cineplex they wish to edit
    HomeBoundary
    Home UI for the MOBALIMA app Customers can view ticket prices Search and list movies Search for bookings List the top 5 movies by sales or ratings Staff can manage movies/cinplex Configure system settings
    MovieBoundary
    UI for movie
    MovieReviewBoundary
    UI for user interact with the reviews
    ShowTimeBoundary
    UI to interact with the show time
    SystemSettingsBoundary
    UI for system settings
    UserBoundary
    UI for user
